page.title: 03THE BRADWELL 10
page.content: Bradwell 10 ------------- In 1978 ten men got together and formed an organisation called Bradwell 10. The aim of this was to encourage friendship and helpfulness in the community. If they hear of anybody in need they will give any help they can. In addition to this they raise money for a variety of good causes - eg. the Youth Club; the St. John's Ambulance Brigade and the Memorial Hall Fund. The ways in which they help individuals are varied. On one occasion they helped a friend with severe arthritis to scale Bradwell Edge so that he could look down on his village again. They have cleaned Bradwell Brook out and they organise the bonfire and firework display.
